title: For What reason anyone WOULD WANT TO R,R with Leblanc
body:
Unless you want to disrespect your opponent, you cannot control the DECOY,
Its USELESS,
why would you R,R to send a decoy that will have either a 150sec cooldown or 60sec cooldown. + that does no DAMAGE.
Why would I want to waste the 150sec ammo ?
R,Q
R,W
R,E
Is much more useful than R,R
Why does it has to be a toggle,
Why can't you use it like Heimerdinger R, where he can R then cancel it by pressing R again.
Why does Leblanc not have the same option?
with the current REWORK,
she has limited use of combo,
everyone would just spam R,Q,Q nobody cares about her R,W or R,E
Her Q does more DAMAGE and its the safest one to proc her passive without putting her at risk for no reason.
Riot,
Delay Leblanc Rework as much as you can, this kit is not GOOD.
There is soo much flaw that could point out.
There is too much Risk, Too much Delay, Very Little Reward, and hard itemization. power curve is very shifted and randomize, meaning she'll do alot of damage at one point of the game then fall off then do more damage then fall off again.

replies.body: why didn't you link to the rework after all that typing?
According to S@20, the R-R cooldown is separate from the main ability's cooldown. Meaning you can cast R-R, then R-Q/R-W/R-E without having to wait at all.

Yeah, it's just a bonus.

Let the mind games begin.

Old le blanc was completely useful . Many tactics can be used .
Hard to play Hard to be master at 
But when you're master you can deceive enermy champions a lot
I dont know how could they rework LeBlanc !
I'm gonna miss her tactics a lot
